clean_door.description: Clean the door of the trashcan.

clean_drawer.description: Clean the drawer of the trashcan.

slide_drawer.description: Slide the drawer in or out.

clean_drawer_2.description: Clean the drawer of the trashcan thoroughly.

slide_drawer_2.description: Slide the drawer in or out gently.

wipe_trashcan_body.description: Clean the main body of the trashcan to remove dirt or debris.

clean_trashcan_body_2.description: Clean the main body of the trashcan to remove dust.

press_trashcan_body.description: Press the body of the trashcan slightly.

clean_whole_trashcan.description: Clean the entire trashcan including the body, door, and drawer.

manipulate_whole_trashcan.description: Manupulate the whole trashcan including rotating the door and sliding the drawer in and out.

clean_all.description: Clean the entire trashcan including the body, door, and drawer thoroughly.

manipulate_all.description: Manupulate the whole trashcan gently including pressing the door, sliding the drawer in and out, and pressing the trashcan body.
